amendment.description: To increase funding for the Southwest border enforcement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 912 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 912 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR 10/20/2011 S6829-6830, S6848-6849) To increase funding for the Southwest border enforcement.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 912 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Kyl.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 912 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
